mainText:
Steve Jobs was the Tony Stark of our day.

He was a Golden Rod in the midst of copper wires.

He was a true visionary, innovator, and an awe-inspiring human being.

Steve Jobs will always be remembered for the colossal impact he had on the
way we use technology.

Rest in iPeace, Steve Jobs.

Thank you for your contribution to humanity.

Thank you.
author: Jonathan
